bill.title: Naturopathic Medicine; Naturopathic Physicians; Continuing Education
bill.description: Requires naturopathic physicians to complete a minimum of thirty-five hours of continuing education courses, including a minimum of fifteen hours of pharmacology, during each licensing renewal biennium, beginning December 31, 2017. (CD1)

history.action: Introduced.
